com.github.wuic.util

Class PollingScheduler.Polling

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.wuic.util.PollingScheduler.Polling
  • Enclosing class:
    PollingScheduler<T>

    public class PollingScheduler.Polling
extends Object

    This class represents a polling information. It's composed of a listener to be notified polling is performed and a set of patterns matching the desired nuts.

    Since:
    0.4.0
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET
